actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to terminate the powers and duties of the Interstate Commerce Commission under section 7 of the Bankruptcy Act with respect to a railroad in reorganization which conveys rail properties to the corporation or to a profitable railroad pursuant to the final system plan.

summary.text: Terminates the powers and duties of the Interstate Commerce Commission under the Bankruptcy Act with respect to a railroad in reorganization which conveys rail properties to the Corporation or to a profitable railroad pursuant to the final system plan established under the Regional Rail Reorganization Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to terminate the powers and duties of the Interstate Commerce Commission under section 7 of the Bankruptcy Act with respect to a railroad in reorganization which conveys rail properties to the corporation or to a profitable railroad pursuant to the final system plan.
